Text: Forrester Researchs Online Energy Trading free analyst breakfast Houston May limited availabilityBelow is invite to Forrester Researchs complimentary May nd energy breakfast Limited availability Please share with anyone else in your organization interested in attending You can signup via the link below When signing up hit continue if the screen asks for a reservation code My contact information is below if you have any questions Online wholesale trade will reach trillion in dominated by financial derivatives Todays search for trading liquidity will restructure the industry into three markets liquidity hubs merchant platforms and solution sites Jim Walker senior analyst at Forrester Research will discuss this topic in detail at New Directions For Online Energy Trading a complimentary Executive Breakfast The Event will be held at the St Regis Hotel in Houston on May This valuable session will focus on these questions What will energy trading look like in four years What will drive trading growth in online exchanges What role will energy merchants play in the new markets Seats are limited Agenda am Breakfast And Registration am New Directions For Online Energy Trading Jim Walker senior analyst Forrester am Q A Session Location The St Regis Houston Briar Oaks Lane Houston Texas You may register for this Event online at EventsByLocationTXUShtml or by going to wwwforrestercom and following the Events link We look forward to seeing you in Houston on May David Kobierowski Sr Account Manager Forrester Research Inc Congress Ave Suite Austin TX orrestercom Phone Fax
